scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf declarations && yarn webpack && cd ..
scripts.tarball: yarn version && cp package.json dist/. && cd dist && yarn pack
scripts.dts: yarn dts-bundle --name @queelag/telegram --main declarations/index.d.ts && mv declarations/@queelag/telegram.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
scripts.deploy: yarn test && MODE=PRODUCTION yarn build && yarn dts && yarn tarball && yarn publish dist/*.tgz --access public && git push
